Name: Nature and Wisdom
Title: Wisdom of the Joyous Spirits
Desc: "That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."

Talent.Name: Nature and Wisdom
Talent.Desc: Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3404}Sumeru characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
